## Din varukorg

```{=html}
<section class="shop-layout">
  <article class="shop-card">
    <ul id="cart-items" class="cart-list"></ul>
    <p id="cart-empty">Varukorgen är tom.</p>
  </article>

  <article class="shop-card">
    <h2>Kassa</h2>
    <form id="checkout-form" class="checkout-form">
      <label>
        Namn
        <input name="name" type="text" autocomplete="name" required>
      </label>
      <label>
        E-post
        <input name="email" type="email" autocomplete="email" required>
      </label>
      <button type="submit">Skicka beställning</button>
    </form>
  </article>
</section>

<script type="module" src="assets/js/cart.js"></script>
<script type="module" src="assets/js/checkout.js"></script>
```
